TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IntraSpacing extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Math.TwipsMeasureType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 and above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is m:intraSp.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **intraSp (Intra-Equation Spacing)** This element specifies the spacing between adjacent display math paragraphs, in twips. If this element is omitted, no spacing is applied between adjacent math paragraphs. |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |mathPr (§22.1.2.62)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (Value)|Specifies the value, in twips, of the parent element.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_TwipsMeasure* simple type (§22.9.2.14).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_TwipsMeasure) is located in §A.6.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the IntraSpacing class.
